title: pADap-pADa
sahitya:
pAdap-pAdat-tighaTTA amudam paramEshvaran nAma bhajanam onrE


anupallavi

  vADum payirkku mazhai pOl manamirangi
 karuNai pozhi bhaktavatsalan tiru nAmam


caraNam    sakala jIva rAshigaTkum tAi tandai avanoruvanE enru santatamum
 kapaTam illA cintai tanil tiruvaDi maravAdu jagadIshanai mayilApuri
 vAsanai shankaranai shiva shambhuvai kalpaka amibkaiyoDu sadA shiva shiva enap-
